description: From Middle English sinistrousely, equivalent to sinistrous +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: sinistrously (comparative more sinistrously, superlative most sinistrously)

entries.meaning: In a sinistrous manner; perversely; wrongly; unluckily.
With a tendency to use the left hand.
examples: Many, in their infancy, are sinistrously disposed, and divers continue all their life left-handed.
